title: cd - Go to the specified directory
description: cd: Change the current working directory. (Go to the specified directory)

title: cd - Go up to the parent of the current directory
description: cd: Change the current working directory. (Go up to the parent of the current directory)

title: cd - Go to the root directory of the current drive
description: cd: Change the current working directory. (Go to the root directory of the current drive)

title: cls - Clear the screen resetting colors to white on black
description: cls: Clear the screen and reset colors. (Clear the screen resetting colors to white on black)

title: chdir - View documentation for the original command
description: chdir: This command is an alias of `CD`. (View documentation for the original command)

title: path - Display the current search path
description: path: Display or set the search path for executable files. This command is available in `FreeDOS` only. (Display the current search path)

title: path - Set the semicolon-separated list of directories to search in
description: path: Display or set the search path for executable files. This command is available in `FreeDOS` only. (Set the semicolon-separated list of directories to search in)

title: path - Append a directory to the search path
description: path: Display or set the search path for executable files. This command is available in `FreeDOS` only. (Append a directory to the search path)

title: path - Add a directory to the beginning of the search path
description: path: Display or set the search path for executable files. This command is available in `FreeDOS` only. (Add a directory to the beginning of the search path)

title: path - Clear the search path
description: path: Display or set the search path for executable files. This command is available in `FreeDOS` only. (Clear the search path)

title: path - Display help
description: path: Display or set the search path for executable files. This command is available in `FreeDOS` only. (Display help)
